verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Therefore thou son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against גּ֔וֹג <S%H1463><s%> against Gog וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> and say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> I am against גּ֔וֹג <S%H1463><s%> Behold I [am] against thee O Gog נְשִׂ֕יא <S%H5387><s%> prince רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief מֶ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> of Meshech וְתֻבָֽל׃ <S%H8422><s%> and Tubal

וְשֹׁבַבְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7725><s%> And I will turn thee back וְשִׁשֵּׁאתִ֔יךָ <S%H8338><s%> and leave but the sixth part וְהַעֲלִיתִ֖יךָ <S%H5927><s%> of thee and will cause thee to come up מִיַּרְכְּתֵ֣י <S%H3411><s%> parts צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> from the north וַהֲבִאוֹתִ֖ךָ <S%H935><s%> and will bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> thee upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <S%H5221><s%> And I will smite קַשְׁתְּךָ֖ <S%H7198><s%> thy bow מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand שְׂמֹאולֶ֑ךָ <S%H8040><s%> out of thy left וְחִצֶּ֕יךָ <S%H2671><s%> and will cause thine arrows מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand יְמִינְךָ֖ <S%H3225><s%> out of thy right אַפִּֽיל׃ <S%H5307><s%> to fall

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָרֵ֨י <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תִּפּ֗וֹל <S%H5307><s%> Thou shalt fall אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲגַפֶּ֔יךָ <S%H102><s%> thou and all thy bands וְעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> and the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for לְעֵ֨יט <S%H5861><s%> thee unto the ravenous צִפּ֧וֹר <S%H6833><s%> birds כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to every כָּנָ֛ף <S%H3671><s%> of every sort וְחַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> and [to] the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <S%H5414><s%> that [is] with thee I will give לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> to be devoured

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the open הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> field תִּפּ֑וֹל <S%H5307><s%> Thou shalt fall כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> is I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <S%H7971><s%> And I will send אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּמָג֔וֹג <S%H4031><s%> on Magog וּבְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> and among them that dwell הָאִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> in the isles לָבֶ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> carelessly וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁ֜י <S%H6944><s%> So will I make my holy אוֹדִ֗יעַ <S%H3045><s%> known בְּתוֹךְ֙ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אַחֵ֥ל <S%H2490><s%> and I will not [let them] pollute אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁ֖י <S%H6944><s%> my holy ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore וְיָדְע֤וּ <S%H3045><s%> shall know הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> any more and the heathen כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָאָה֙ <S%H935><s%> Behold it is come וְנִֽהְיָ֔תָה <S%H1961><s%> and it is done נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> That הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this [is] the day אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> of which דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> whereof I have spoken

וְֽיָצְא֞וּ <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth יֹשְׁבֵ֣י ׀ <S%H3427><s%> And they that dwell עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבִעֲר֡וּ <S%H1197><s%> and shall set וְ֠הִשִּׂיקוּ <S%H5400><s%> and burn בְּנֶ֨שֶׁק <S%H5402><s%> the weapons וּמָגֵ֤ן <S%H4043><s%> both the shields וְצִנָּה֙ <S%H6793><s%> and the bucklers בְּקֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> the bows וּבְחִצִּ֔ים <S%H2671><s%> and the arrows וּבְמַקֵּ֥ל <S%H4731><s%> war יָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> able וּבְרֹ֑מַח <S%H7420><s%> and the spears וּבִעֲר֥וּ <S%H1197><s%> and they shall burn בָהֶ֛ם אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> on fire שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> They will not יִשְׂא֨וּ <S%H5375><s%> So that they shall take עֵצִ֜ים <S%H6086><s%> no wood מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> out of the field וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> or יַחְטְבוּ֙ <S%H2404><s%> neither cut down מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H3293><s%> [any] out of the forests כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> with בַנֶּ֖שֶׁק <S%H5402><s%> the weapons יְבַֽעֲרוּ־ <S%H1197><s%> for they shall burn אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וְשָׁלְל֣וּ <S%H7997><s%> and they shall spoil אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֹׁלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H7997><s%> those that spoiled וּבָֽזְזוּ֙ <S%H962><s%> them and rob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֹּ֣זְזֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H962><s%> those that robbed נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> them saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> I אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> [that] I will give לְגוֹג֩ ׀ <S%H1463><s%> unto Gog מְקֽוֹם־ <S%H4725><s%> a place שָׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> there קֶ֜בֶר <S%H6913><s%> there of graves בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel גֵּ֤י <S%H1516><s%> the valley הָעֹֽבְרִים֙ <S%H5674><s%> of the passengers קִדְמַ֣ת <S%H6926><s%> on the east הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וְחֹסֶ֥מֶת <S%H2629><s%> and it shall stop הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹֽבְרִ֑ים <S%H5674><s%> the [noses] of the passengers וְקָ֣בְרוּ <S%H6912><s%> and there shall they bury שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גּוֹג֙ <S%H1463><s%> Gog וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲמוֹנֹ֔ה <S%H1995><s%> and all his multitude וְקָ֣רְא֔וּ <S%H7121><s%> and they shall call גֵּ֖יא <S%H1516><s%> [it] The valley הֲמ֥וֹן גּֽוֹג׃ <S%H1996><s%> of Hamongog

וּקְבָרוּם֙ <S%H6912><s%> be burying בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> shall the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> order טַהֵ֣ר <S%H2891><s%> of them that they may cleanse אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land שִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> And seven חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H2320><s%> months

וְקָֽבְרוּ֙ <S%H6912><s%> shall bury כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> Yea all the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם לְשֵׁ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> [them] and it shall be to them a renown י֚וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day הִכָּ֣בְדִ֔י <S%H3513><s%> that I shall be glorified נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְאַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> men תָמִ֤יד <S%H8548><s%> of continual employment יַבְדִּ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H914><s%> And they shall sever out עֹבְרִ֣ים <S%H5674><s%> passing through בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מְקַבְּרִ֣ים <S%H6912><s%> to bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹבְרִ֗ים <S%H5674><s%> with the passengers אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנּוֹתָרִ֛ים <S%H3498><s%> those that remain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth לְטַֽהֲרָ֑הּ <S%H2891><s%> to cleanse מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> it after the end שִׁבְעָֽה־ <S%H7651><s%> of seven חֳדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H2320><s%> months יַחְקֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H2713><s%> shall they search

וְעָבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> And the passengers הָעֹֽבְרִים֙ <S%H5674><s%> [that] pass through בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְרָאָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> when [any] seeth עֶ֣צֶם <S%H6106><s%> bone אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> a man's וּבָנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> then shall he set up אֶצְל֖וֹ <S%H681><s%> by צִיּ֑וּן <S%H6725><s%> a sign עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until קָבְר֤וּ <S%H6912><s%> it till the buriers אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמְקַבְּרִ֔ים <S%H6912><s%> have buried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גֵּ֖יא <S%H1516><s%> it in the valley הֲמ֥וֹן גּֽוֹג׃ <S%H1996><s%> of Hamongog

וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> and even שֶׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> And also the name עִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city הֲמוֹנָ֖ה <S%H1997><s%> [shall be] Hamonah וְטִהֲר֥וּ <S%H2891><s%> Thus shall they cleanse הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land ס

וְאַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> And thou son אָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> of man כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אֱמֹר֩ <S%H559><s%> Speak לְצִפּ֨וֹר <S%H6833><s%> fowl כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to every כָּנָ֜ף <S%H3671><s%> unto every feathered וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> every חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> and to every beast הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field הִקָּבְצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> Assemble וָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> yourselves and come הֵאָסְפ֣וּ <S%H622><s%> gather מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> yourselves on every side עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto זִבְחִ֗י <S%H2077><s%> to my sacrifice אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> I am זֹבֵ֤חַ <S%H2076><s%> that I do sacrifice לָכֶם֙ זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> for you [even] a great עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֥ם <S%H398><s%> that ye may eat בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh וּשְׁתִ֥יתֶם <S%H8354><s%> and drink דָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> blood

בְּשַׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh גִּבּוֹרִים֙ <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> Ye shall eat וְדַם־ <S%H1818><s%> the blood נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <S%H5387><s%> of the princes הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תִּשְׁתּ֑וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink אֵילִ֨ים <S%H352><s%> of rams כָּרִ֤ים <S%H3733><s%> of lambs וְעַתּוּדִים֙ <S%H6260><s%> and of goats פָּרִ֔ים <S%H6499><s%> of bullocks מְרִיאֵ֥י <S%H4806><s%> all of them fatlings בָשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

וַאֲכַלְתֶּם־ <S%H398><s%> And ye shall eat חֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> fat לְשָׂבְעָ֔ה <S%H7654><s%> till ye be full וּשְׁתִ֥יתֶם <S%H8354><s%> and drink דָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> blood לְשִׁכָּר֑וֹן <S%H7943><s%> till ye be drunken מִזִּבְחִ֖י <S%H2077><s%> of my sacrifice אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which זָבַ֥חְתִּי <S%H2076><s%> which I have sacrificed לָכֶֽם׃

וּשְׂבַעְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7646><s%> Thus ye shall be filled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at שֻׁלְחָנִי֙ <S%H7979><s%> at my table ס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> with horses וָרֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and chariots גִּבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> with mighty men וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and with all men מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> of war נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> And I will set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּבוֹדִ֖י <S%H3519><s%> my glory בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen וְרָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> and all the heathen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטִי֙ <S%H4941><s%> my judgment אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> that I have executed וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> and my hand אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שַׂ֥מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> that I have laid בָהֶֽם׃

וְיָדְע֣וּ <S%H3045><s%> shall know הַ֠גּוֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> And the heathen כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בַעֲוֹנָ֞ם <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity גָּל֣וּ <S%H1540><s%> went into captivity בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> that the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they מָֽעֲלוּ־ <S%H4603><s%> because they trespassed בִ֔י וָאַסְתִּ֥ר <S%H5641><s%> against me therefore hid פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> I my face מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וָֽאֶתְּנֵם֙ <S%H5414><s%> from them and gave בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand צָרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6862><s%> of their enemies וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> so fell בַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> they all by the sword כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> and all

כְּטֻמְאָתָ֥ם <S%H2932><s%> According to their uncleanness וּכְפִשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6588><s%> and according to their transgressions עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> have I done אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וָאַסְתִּ֥ר <S%H5641><s%> unto them and hid פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> my face מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like ס

וְנָשׂוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> After that they have borne אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלִמָּתָ֔ם <S%H3639><s%> their shame וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַעֲלָ֖ם <S%H4603><s%> whereby they have trespassed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which מָעֲלוּ־ <S%H4604><s%> and all their trespasses בִ֑י בְּשִׁבְתָּ֧ם <S%H3427><s%> against me when they dwelt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַדְמָתָ֛ם <S%H127><s%> in their land לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> safely וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> and none made [them] afraid
